# TabulatedRatingCurve { #ribasim.TabulatedRatingCurve }

`TabulatedRatingCurve()`

Linearly interpolates discharge between a tabulation of level and discharge.

## Parameters

| Name     | Type                       | Description                            | Default   |
|----------|----------------------------|----------------------------------------|-----------|
| `static` | pd.DataFrame               | Table with constant rating curves.     | required  |
| `time`   | pandas.DataFrame, optional | Table with time-varying rating curves. | required  |
